0.name: Unknown Voice
0.text:
He. Is. Watching.
He has his eye.. directly.. upon you.
You disturbed his temple.. and he is angry.

I have been trying to rid this universe of this being for longer than you can imagine.

The things you see.. 
They aren't real, ignore them.
He is trying to melt your mind.

I can help you, if you help me.

Bring these seeds to their designated celestial bodies.
It will distract him for long enough.

Once that's done.. return..
And I will make my move.

Sometimes a sacrifice is needed.. to banish evil.. for good.

1.name: Stones of purification
1.text:
The stones of purification

These stones hold incredible power.
Through the crystal growing within, it can be used to alter matter.

To rid food of mold, crops of insects, water of plagues.
It can speed the growth of plants, heal the wounded, increase their strength.

Only when put together in precise ways can their power be used.

2.name: Purifying shrine
2.text:
The purifying shrine

This device was designed to harvest and project the power of the purifying stones and spread their effect across areas far and wide.

The farmers most often used these to stabilize their farmland and increase the rate at which their crops grew.
